FuncDef: The display atm service command displays configuration about the service type template of PVCs and PVPs.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a service type template of PVCs and PVPs.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
After a service type and its parameters are specified for PVCs and PVPs and applied to specific PVCs and PVPs, you can run the
display atm service command to view configuration about the service type template. When you use the display atm service command, note the following:
If you do not specify any parameter, the command displays configuration about all service type templates of PVCs and PVPs.If you specify the svcName, the command displays configuration about the specified service type template of PVCs and PVPs.
